Subject: Disabling Inherited Tests

X-eGroups-Approved-By: ddoss_2006 <didoss@...> via email; 30 May 2007 16:37:34 -0000

Hi,

I've created
a SetupTest class
that just performs setup,
but also tests the setup.

So when other test
classes inherit from it,
the inherited tests run
each time.

Anyone know if I can disable the inherited tests?

Thanks,
- Ole
subject: Disabling Inherited Tests
